page.title: 05PARSONAGE FARM, ROCHFORD.
page.content: MR AND MRS WILDING HAVE BEEN LIVING AT THE BLACK AND WHITE FARMHOUSE AT THE BOTTOM OF THE LONG, BUMPY LANE FOR 52 YRS.THERE IS A DUCK_POND BY THE HOUSE AND A LOT OF BUILDINGS.THEY HAVE 70 ACRES OF LAND,MOSTLY GRASS WITH SOME ORCHARDS.THEY SPECIALIZE IN SHEEP AND HAVE 200,AND ALSO 14 RAMS.IN 1982 A NEW SHEEP HOUSE WAS BUILT AROUND THE OLD ONE WITH THE SHEARING MACHINE IN.FLEECES GO TO BROMYARD AND BEST GRADE WOOL FETCHES Â£1.28KG.THEY HAVE 2 WORKING SHEEPDOGS AND A PET BOXER.THEY HAVE 18 STORE CATTLE WHICH WILL BE SOLD AT TENBURY MARKET.THEY HAVE 2 COWS WITH 3 SUCKLING CALVES.THEIR SHIRE MARE HAS A MONTH OLD FOAL AND THEY ALSO HAVE A YEARLING SHIRE HORSE. THEIR WATER COMES FROM A 150FT BORE HOLE.THEY MAKE HAY BUT NO SILAGE. ONLY FAMILY HELP IS USED ON THE FARM.
